EntrySubject: Received £75 for one recording session for S4C's Dechrau Canu, Dechrau Canmol prgoramme as a member of a choir. This is not ongoing work - it was one session of approximately 5 hours (SO 4.3 -Band 1 - Less than 5 hours per week)

EntrySubject: Two tickets and hospitality to Dragons v Gloucester on 9 April 2022 from BT - guest was Member's support staff.

EntrySubject: Tickets for Bafta Cymru for the Member and his wife from Channel 4 - tickets for the event and the after-show party.

CategoryCaption: 4. Category 4: Gifts, hospitality, material benefit or advantage
EntrySubject: Tickets for the Member and his wife to the recording of the Luke Evans Christmas Show in the ICC Wales from BBC Cymru (including a pre-recording drinks reception) on 10 November 2022.

CategoryCaption: 4. Category 4: Gifts, hospitality, material benefit or advantage
EntrySubject: Tickets for the BBC Cardiff Singer of the World.

CategoryCaption: 4. Category 4: Gifts, hospitality, material benefit or advantage
EntrySubject: Participated in the North American Festival of Wales in Lincoln, Nebraska on 29 August – 4 September 2023, organised by the Welsh North America Association. Took part in events and gave two seminars. Member was accompanied by his wife at the festival. Hospitality included hotel accommodation at the Marriott Cornhusker ($798.54), festival weekend passes ($160), tickets to the opening concert ($50), grand banquet tickets ($140), and grand concert tickets ($80). Total value of hospitality was $1228.54 (£986.03).

EntrySubject: Tickets to a reception and concert by Catrin Finch and Aoife Ni Bhriain on 10 November 2023 in the Royal College of Music and Drama supplied by the Irish Consul, worth £22 each.

CategoryCaption: 4. Category 4: Gifts, hospitality, material benefit or advantage
EntrySubject: Tickets to the 25th anniversary celebration of Cardiff Muslim School worth £25 each from the trustees of the charity for my wife and me.

EntrySubject: Two tickets for the Member and his wife to the Mothers Matter – Ball of Hope 2024 on 14 September 2024. Provided by Heledd Fychan MS.

EntrySubject: Tickets for a reception and performance of the WNO's Marriage of Figaro at the WMC. Provided by the WNO.
